title: English
description: This website lists and maps resources that culture creators in Århus can use to realize their projects. The resources on the map can be sorted in various ways, so that you see just a list of venues, galleries, event makers, etc. Most of the information is in Danish. Below you can find translations of each category. If you have a hard time reading the ressource descriptions, we recommend using a tool like google translate, or browsing with a Danish-reading friend.
meta: This website lists and maps resources that culture creators in Århus can use to realize their projects.
